title: Fragment of a Head with Shaven Skull
description:
Black granodiorite fragment of head of man. Preserved portion includes the eyes, part of nose, top of skull and major portion of left side of head including the ear. Deep-set eyes, high check-bone, eyebrows not indicated, shaved skull of ovoid shape. Mat surface.  
Condition: Preserved portion has a few trivial chips.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
